description: Try our easy to follow Steak With Warm Potato & Roast Capsicum Salad recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Steak,Seafood free,Gluten free,Egg free,Winter,Sesame free,Beef,Potato,Jul 2020,Father's Day,Soy free,Wheat free,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Steak With Warm Potato & Roast Capsicum Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place potato in a large saucepan and cover with cold water. Cover with lid and bring to the boil over high heat. Reduce heat to medium-high and boil for 10 minutes or until just tender. Drain. Transfer to a bowl.

Meanwhile, place capsicum, almonds, garlic and parsley in a food processor and process until chopped. Add lemon juice and half the oil and process until almost smooth. Pour over potato, tossing to coat, then season. Add onion and salad leaves, tossing to combine.
Heat remaining oil in a large frying pan over high heat. Season beef, then cook for 30 seconds on each side or until browned. Cut into strips and serve with warm potato salad.
